main event: A UFO sighting occurred on 9 February 1955 at Dobbins AFB in Georgia, where a round, transparent to silver object was observed stationary for two hours.
interesting points: The object was observed by numerous witnesses. It disintegrated in the air with two-thirds of its main body disappearing, leaving a remaining portion that attained high speed. It displayed a red flashing light on the bottom and a definite red color on the upper side. Weather conditions were ideal with clear skies, yet it was reported as possibly being a weather balloon. The observer was a pilot and experienced in identifying such phenomena.
witness description: captain and housewife in Atlanta, Georgia
